titleStmt.title: Ordinaunces decreed for reformation of diuers disorders in pryntyng and vtteryng of bookes
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Privy Council.

notesStmt.note: "At the starre Chamber the .xxix. day of Iune, anno .1566. & the .vii. yere of the Queenes Maiesties raigne."
